com.thomsonreuters.upa.examples.consumer

Class MarketByPriceHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thomsonreuters.upa.examples.consumer.MarketPriceHandler
      • com.thomsonreuters.upa.examples.consumer.MarketByPriceHandler

  • public class MarketByPriceHandler
extends MarketPriceHandler
    This is the market by price handler for the UPA consumer application. It provides method decoding a field entry from a response. Methods for sending the market by price request(s) to a provider, processing the response(s) and closing streams are inherited from MarketPriceHandler.
